s1.name: RUBiS Files Structure
s1.p: The directory tree of RUBiS is organized as follow:

tr.td: This directory contains the main Makefile/build.xml file and the license agreement.
Makefile configuration file (if you use make you should edit this file to match your configuration)
Ant build files configuration file (if you use ant you should edit this file to match your configuration)
contains the results of the measurements and the scripts to generate graphs and statistics.
Benchmark client to simulate clients and perform measurements.
contains the SQL files among with the lists of regions and categories used to generate the database data.
contains the html files and PHP scripts for the version of RUBiS that is designed to be used with PHP only.

table.td: contains the html files for the version of RUBiS that is designed to be used with Java servlets only.

tr.td:
contains the files that describes the workload of the bidding system. We designed various patterns of request distribution. The browse_only_transition pattern simulate user's behavior that only generate read requests from the database.
The default_transition pattern is a mix of read and write requests. It simulates a user who looks for items and categories but also who can sell or put bids on items.
